sdAddStorageFacilityDetailsAddressText: An address must be added for this storage facility.
sdWhatStorageFacilityText: What is the storage facility address?
hintApprovalNumber: If the storage facility has an approval number, enter it here. For example, UK/ABC/001, 1 UK 22028 or TSF001.
productApprovalheadingLabel: From January 2026, adding details of product handling will be mandatory under new EU regulations. Press Save and continue to skip this section.
sdAddStorageAddressRequired: An address must be added for this storage facility.
sdStorageArrivalDateHint: This should be the date the product was unloaded at the storage facility. For example, 25 07 2025
sdArrivalDateValidationError: Arrival date must be a real date
